topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Configuring Multi-backend Storage Support

body.p: During the installation of HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0, you configured a combination of storage types: VMDK, 3PAR, and/or VSA.
You can now use the Horizon dashbaord to create volume types, which are required for launching virtual machine instances.
From Horizon Admin ->volumes create all 3 volume types as below.
